import gsap from'gsap';// OPEN MENU
export var staggerReveal=function staggerReveal(node1,node2){gsap.from([node1,node2],{duration:0.6,height:0,transformOrigin:'left top',skewY:0,ease:'power3.inOut',stagger:{amount:0.2}});};// CLOSE MENU
export var staggerRevealClose=function staggerRevealClose(node1,node2){gsap.to([node1,node2],{duration:0.8,height:0,ease:'power3.inOut',stagger:{amount:0.09}});};// STAGGER THE LINKS TO APPEAR
export var staggerText=function staggerText(node1,node2,node3,node4,node5){gsap.from([node1,node2,node3,node4,node5],{duration:0.9,y:100,delay:0.3,ease:'power3.inOut',stagger:{amount:0.4}});};// Fade up for the additonal info on our menu
export var fadeInUp=function fadeInUp(node){gsap.from(node,{y:10,duration:0.1,delay:0.2,opacity:0,ease:'power3.inOut'});};// Hover on the link
export var handleHover=function handleHover(e){gsap.to(e.target,{duration:0.3,y:3,skewX:10,ease:'power1.inOut'});};// Hover off the link
export var handleHoverExit=function handleHoverExit(e){gsap.to(e.target,{duration:0.6,y:3,skewX:0,ease:'power1.inOut'});};
